title: MESSAGE
description: A “message” is an authored, possibly signed, piece of content intended for one or more recipients. Since the recipient may or may not be known directly, recipients are specified in the `ADDRESSED_MESSAGE` class.

audit.description: Details of who actually created the message and when. This is the person who entered the data or otherwise caused the message to be created, or might be a piece of software.

author.description: Party responsible for the message content, who may or may not be technically responsible for its creation (e.g. by data entry etc).

signature.description: Optional signature by the author of message content in openPGP format. The signature is created as a Hash and optional signing of the serialisation of this message object with this signature field Void.
